form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Banks (for himself and Ms. Cortez Masto) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To permit the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency to set compensation for executive officers of Federal Home Loan Banks, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Curtailing Unreasonable Remuneration at Banks Act or the CURB Act.

section.header: Compensation for executive officers of Federal Home Loan Banks
section.text: Section 7 of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act (12 U.S.C. 1427) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first subsection (l) (relating to withholding of compensation)—

subparagraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking Withholding of compensation and inserting Compensation of executive officers;
by striking Notwithstanding and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Notwithstanding section 1318(d) of the Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992 (12 U.S.C. 4518(d)), the Director may establish compensation for any executive officer of a Federal Home Loan Bank that is reasonable and comparable in accordance with regulations promulgated by the Director.
by striking the second subsection (l) (relating to the transition rule).
